content:
I am trying to write a game for my course, and I need to use the tactic have. However, If I try to add it to the inventory with NewTactic rw linarith have I get the error unexpected token 'have'; expected command. I guess it is because have is a built in reserved keyword and is treated differently than other tactics.

Which is the way to use it in games?
Miguel Marco has marked this topic as resolved.
